  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDER WAS DISPATCHED OUT TO PD-6 FOR A LEAKING PACKAGE. RESPONDER PICKED UP THE LEAKING PACKAGE AND BROUGHT IT BACK TO THE DMP AREA FOR FUTHER EVALUATION. RESPONDER NOTED THAT 1 OF THE 2 CONTAINERS LAS LEAKING DUE TO A LOOSE CAP/LID.

item.title: Report X-2025051860
item.description:
Report X-2025051860

Identified by scraper @ 2025-06-10T03:46:53+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-05-19
  • City: LENEXA
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: LEAKER WAS CALLED IN BEFORE THE SORT BY UNLOAD SUPERVISOR. DMP DISPATCHED A RESPONDER TO THE LEAKER WITH FULL PPE AND SPILL CART. RESPONDER ARRIVED ON SCENE AND FOUND THE LEAKING PACKAGE. RESPONDER CONSULTED WITH THE DECSION TREE WHICH LED TO THE CORRSIVE RESPONSE SHEET. RESPONDER CLEANED UP THE SPILL FOLLOWING RESPONSE SHEET GUIDLINES AND BROUGHT LEAKER BACK TO DMP FOR PROPER DISPOSAL.

item.title: Report E-2025050208
item.description:
Report E-2025050208

Identified by scraper @ 2025-06-10T03:46:53+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-05-12
  • City: SALINA
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 5000
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: XPO-Logistics contacted ERTS regarding a leaking 250-gallon plastic tote containing hazardous product, Zirca-Sil 18. A contractor dispatched and observed an estimated 1-ounce release onto the top of the tote in a 3’ x 3’ area as a result of a loose cap and missing bung cap. The contractor used absorbent pads to clean-up the release and tightened the cap. One 30-gallon DF of waste was generated containing the impacted absorbents. XPO will manage all waste created from the response. No storm-drains, waterways, or soil were involved in this incident.

item.title: Report X-2025050633
item.description:
Report X-2025050633

Identified by scraper @ 2025-06-10T03:46:53+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-05-06
  • City: LENEXA
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: FOUR AIR PACKAGES PREPRINTED PERISHABLE AND WERE COLD TO THE TOUCH. UPON INSPECTION OF THE INNER CONTENTS, WE DISCOVERED APPROXIMATELY TWO POUNDS OR LESS OF DRY ICE COOLING MEAT. THESE PACKAGES ALSO CONTAINED NON-REGULATED GLACIER ICE GEL PACKS. ADDITIONAL TRACKING NUMBERS TO VARIOUS CONSIGNEES IN THE USA ARE 1Z9Y8A891312291704, 1Z9Y8A891302126652 AND 1Z9Y8A891316347647. THESE PACKAGES HAVE NOT BEEN ACCEPTED FOR AIR OR TRANSPORTED IN THE AIR BY UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO. THESE PACKAGES WERE SHIPPED USING UPS ACCOUNT NUMBER 9Y8A89, KC CATTLE COMPANY, 20630 MOUNT BETHEL RD, WESTON MO 64098-9075.

item.description:
Report X-2025050400

Identified by scraper @ 2025-06-10T03:46:53+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-05-05
  • City: LENEXA
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release

  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: ONE AIR PACKAGE WAS PREPRINTED PERISHABLE AND WAS COLD TO THE TOUCH. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED THREE POUNDS OF DRY ICE COOLING BEEF. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX TO INDICATE DRY ICE WAS BEING USED TO COOL THE MEAT. THIS PACKAGE WAS SHIPPED USING UPS ACCOUNT NUMBER 9Y8A89, KC CATTLE COMPANY, 20630 MOUNT BETHEL RD, WESTON MO 64098-9075.

item.title: Report X-2025050405
item.description:
Report X-2025050405

Identified by scraper @ 2025-06-10T03:46:53+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-04-25
  • City: MANHATTAN
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: OUTER PACKAGE LEAKED UKNOWN POWDERED MATERIAL. DRIVER RETURNED PACKAGE TO CENTER AS A DAMAGE. UPON OPENING THE PACKAGE, RESPONDER FOUND A BRASS TUMBLER USED FOR CLEANING BRASS SHELL CASINGS. THE MEDIA FROM THE TUMBLER WAS THE LEAKAGE. ALSO DISCOVERED IN THE OUTER PACKAGE WAS A BOX OF QTY 50 WICHESTER .32 AUTO CENTERFIRE CARTRIDGES, LOADED. SUPERVISOR CALLED HAZMAT HOTLINE.
